SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.controls

Class TrashDeckCellFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.controls.TrashDeckCellFXMLController
public class TrashDeckCellFXMLController extends FXMLController
A controller class for managing the display and interactions of a single deck in the trash view. This controller allows users to restore or permanently delete a deck that has been moved to the trash.

The panel displays the deck's name and includes buttons for restoring or permanently deleting the deck. This controller interacts with the trash view to update the list of deleted decks accordingly.
